overview: The notoriously bumbling waiter. The passionate waitress who works her magic on the more than willing customers. Three witches, with decidedly Sapphic learning. A maid who has more interest in occupying the beds than making them. And a unique collection of guest with one thing on their minds: Sex. Can you think of a more pleasant place to stay?  Surrounded by beautiful girls with volcanic personalities, Mike Foster signs an excellent movie with many ups and downs, where sometimes-unexpected sex scenes succeed to each other with a strongly erotic pace. One hot woman is not enough there has to be 4 in one woman for you.
title: Hotel Desire
